titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 96-586, relating to the disposal of certain Federal lands in Nevada, to require the Secretary of the Interior to purchase necessary lands at 1980 prices.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Agriculture Department, Interior Department, OMB.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/2/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to the disposal of certain public lands in Nevada to require the Secretary of the Interior, when acquiring environmentally sensitive lands in the Lake Tahoe Basin, to pay no less than the 1980 appraised value of such lands.
